question: Show cruise ship customers and resort customers that went to a dance class.
sql_query1:
SELECT Customers.Name 
FROM Customers
WHERE (Customers.Vacation_Option = "Cruise Ship" OR Customers.Vacation_Option = "All-Inclusive Resort") AND Customers.Activities = "Dance Class"
sql_query2:
SELECT Customers.Name 
FROM Customers
WHERE Customers.Vacation_Option = "Cruise Ship" OR Customers.Vacation_Option = "All-Inclusive Resort" AND Customers.Activities = "Dance Class"
interpretation1: What cruise ship customers went to a dance class and what resort customers also went to one?
interpretation2: List all cruise ship customers and also list resort customers that went to a dance class.
